text: Kintu yadi tara tomara sange pira-piri kare yena tumi amara sathe ansi damra kara'o ye sanbandhe tomara kache kono jnana ne'i, tahale tadera ubhayera ajnapalana karo na, tabe tadera sange e'i duniyate sadbhabe basabasa karo. Ara tara patha abalanbana karo ye amara prati binayabanata hayeche, atahpara amara'i kache tomadera pratyabartanasthana, takhana ami tomadera janiye deba ya tomara kare yacchile.â€™â€™
